name: Soul Searcher (playmakersdevteam)
description:
Soul Searcher is a turn-based strategy game with procedurally generated dungeons where you have to delve through a dead man’s memories in order to find his soul. 

Create synergies between your team, become capable of overcoming increasingly difficult enemies, reap the rewards and perfect your dream-dwelling team.

Venture solo into the depths of the human mind with characters themed around abstract human concepts such as ideologies, life values, and dream. You will get to explore fragments of a man's memories that have been twisted into hostile, surreal dungeons by an outside force.

These adventures into the memory moiré entail:

  • Levelling up and perk customization
  • The wide array of characters and enemies
  • Branching paths of mechanical and mental skills
  • Bosses and relics to spice up the outcome and obstacles of your runs
